revised_title: Irradiation Effects on Polycrystalline Graphite Dimensional Changes
tldr: This article investigates the dimensional changes in polycrystalline graphites under fast-neutron irradiation. The authors found that the relationship between crystal strains and irradiation dose can be used to estimate high-temperature behavior of graphites and improve their understanding of dimensional changes in various polycrystalline graphite materials.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Materials Science
